titleStmt.title: The life of the Reuerend Fa. Angel of Ioyeuse Capucin preacher Sometimes duke, peere, and marshall of France, and gouernour for the Kinge in Languedoc. Together with the liues of the Reuerend Fathers, Father Bennet Englishman, and Father Archangell Scotchman, of the same ordere. Written first in the Frenche tongue, and now translated into English by R.R. Catholique priest.
Vie du révérend P. Ange de Joyeuse, prédicateur capucin. English

notesStmt.note: Translation of: La vie du révérend P. Ange de Joyeuse, prédicateur capucin.
Translator's dedication signed: R.R. C.P., i.e. Robert Rookwood.
Fa. Angel of Joyeuse = Henri, duc de Joyeuse; Father Bennet = Father Benoît de Canfield; Father Archangell = John Forbes.
The life of Father Archangel is a translation of: Faustinus Cranius. Alter Alexius.

"The miraculous, life, conuersion, and conuersation of the Reuerend Father Bennett of Ca[n]feild" and "An historical narration of the conuersion and conuersation of F. Archangel" have separate pagination and register.
The plates are signed: I. Picart incidit.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
